name: Glitch (itch) (DeadDoom)
description: The Game Was Originally About You Being A Dark Lord But I Noticed I Don't Have Enough Experience On The S So I Created Glitch It Is Short But I Hope You Love It Also Forgive Me My Grammer Isn't So Great And My English As English Is Not My First Btw Its A Rpg Maker Game And Forgive Me My Map Makeing Is Not So Great
